channel.title: Reaper "night immune" problem
channel.description:
For me, the biggest problem with reaper is what happens when he get attacked. The attacker doesn't get any message and the reaper just don't die. I think the attacker should get a message "your target was immune", so the reaper will be able to claim night immune classes like merc / alch / inq /guarded by king.
Right now, every attacker knows that the reaper is 100% reaper.

item.title: Reaper "night immune" problem
item.dc:creator: Aquillion
item.description:
-merc: no one can say they are your target

In my experience, if you revealed to them D1, people will generally believe it (evils are unlikely to want to fake being a merc with a specific target D1, since it puts them in danger of getting called out when their “target” dies and they’re unable to offer a contract to anyone.)
